channel.title: Soulful Living: Deep House Sessions
channel.description:
A journey into deep house, downtempo, and soul. These sessions chronicle all things deep from the smooth and sexy sounds of the dance floor to the chilled out beats for the ear. Compiled and mixed by Omar and inspired by his weekly dj sets at Confidential in downtown San Diego.
Enjoy.
channel.itunes:subtitle: deep soulful house music
channel.itunes:author: Soulful Living
channel.itunes:summary:
A journey into deep house, downtempo, and soul. These sessions chronicle all things deep from the smooth and sexy sounds of the dance floor to the chilled out beats for the ear. Compiled and mixed by Omar and inspired by his weekly dj sets at Confidential in downtown San Diego.
Enjoy.

item.title: Episode 5 The Deeper Soul Sessions
item.description: 1.Sharokh Sound of K - Love Happens (Roberto Rodriguez) 2.Timo Camillo - Milkman 3.Jesus Gonsev - For Music 4.Arnaud D - Sweet Innocence(Jesus Gonsev) 5.Jake Island - Real Love (Rocco) 6.Scope - Strung Out (Jay Leblone) 7.Phonique - Teenage Love (Kevin Yost) 8.Senso - Love With a Time Limit 9.Lovebirds - The Night 10.Jon Silva - I Want U (Dub) 11.Roberto Rodriquez - Ride With Me 12.Jay Leblone - We're All On a Journey
item.dc:creator: Soulful Living

item.title: Episode 2 SHADES AND SHADOWS
item.description: Shades and Shadows. A deep tech collection with music from Rocco, Telepopmusik, Marlon D, and Matthew Bandy. Compiled by DJ Omar
item.dc:creator: Soulful Living
item.itunes:summary: Shades and Shadows. A deep tech collection with music from Rocco, Telepopmusik, Marlon D, and Matthew Bandy. Compiled by DJ Omar

item.title: Episode 4 Music for Soulful Living
item.description:

Panevino - Freeze The Frame 12. Panevino - The Way I Am
Compiled and Mixed by Omar
